website_summaries.verdict: Many people buy the Oggi bar set to make their favorite drinks at home. More of a starter set than a professional kit, but the shaker is secure and the cutting board is a nice addition.
pros: Shakers are glass and stainless steel, with very solid interlock
Includes a cutting board for fruit and garnishes
Mixing cup printed with popular recipes
cons: Included paring knife not sharp enough for fruit prep
Jiggers do not have measurements for partial pours

customer_reviews.title: So happy I finally got this!
customer_reviews.text: I see why some of the other reviews say it's "cheap". The stand it sits in is a little bit cheap, yes. That being said, what you actually get for your money is a great value. I love the Boston cocktail shaker! It works extremely well. The seal on it is extremely tight. The double sided-shot jigger with a handle is awesome. The strainer is high quality. Honestly, all the other parts of the set are high quality and I absolutely love them! The only "cheap" feeling part is the stand, but who cares? It's just a stand! I have been wanting this FOREVER and am so happy to have finally added it to my bar!
customer_reviews.author: Hara Serter

customer_reviews.title: Kind-Of Cheap...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sending this back. The knife didn't cut at all and the shaker didn't seal well. Overall - I thought it wasn't great quality. I think if you are young and just want something to get by - this would do it. However, if you are looking for something substantial and classier looking... this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: KPP

customer_reviews.title: Cool but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product! I bought it for my boyfriend as a 21st birthday gift and he loved it. I would say that it is somewhat cheaply made. The glass and shaker itself are great quality but as for the other pieces they are a little cheaply make but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I really like the glass-and-stainless-steel shaker
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well enough! I really like the glass-and-stainless-steel shaker. This set served me well as I acted as bartender for my dad's 67-guest, 70th birthday bash. My only complaints would be that the knife is pitifully dull and the cutting board is a very hard plastic so I am reluctant to use it. Otherwise, I'd buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hayward-Balash

customer_reviews.title: A very quality piece for the amateur mixologist
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you could realistically want for your home bar. The shaker is very high quality and definitely impressed me the most. The other items, while used significantly less, have proved very helpful given the right circumstances. Everyone who comes over is impressed with the set and especially how compact it is. The items are dishwasher safe which is a huge plus. This is a great value and a good brand of home barware.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Shaker works!! But, bar tools arn't as sturdy as you might expect
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying this. However, i took the plunge and bought it anyways. The shaker is great. It works perfectly WITH NO DRIPS. But, I will agree the finish and the tools aren't as sturdy as you'd like. I'm very picky. It's meets my expectations on sturdiness as far as a 8/10. But, if your looking for a tool set this is definitely the best priced for how much you get at a great quality. I'd recommend it if you don't already have a shaker. But if you do, then get the OXO bar set for roughly the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Solid starter cocktail set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid starter cocktail set. The knife doesn't cut very well, but you should probably have a paring knife on hand anyway. I have three complaints, or it would be five stars: -The tools look good, but have a bit of a cheap feel -The glass for the shaker has tacky drink recipes on the side. I like the measurement markings, but could do without the recipes -The jigger is 2 oz / 1 oz. I think the perfect jigger should include a 1/2 oz measurement. It's easy to remember where the halfway marks are, but I would recommend grabbing a 0.5oz/0.75oz jigger or a measurement shot glass (with the oz/ml markings on the side)
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Total worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Good bar tool set. Quality components. The knife tool has a hook great for grabbing olives and such from the jar but still need to use a knife to slice the fruit and the cutting board is not that good as it is made of plastic and has deep grooves in it already from slicing the fruit. The shaker component doesn't leak a bit when shaking the beverages. Almost perfected my dirty martini thanks to this set :-).
customer_reviews.author: chad j osowski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. And it arrived two days later
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. And it arrived two days later, the exact time I needed them for a party I was hosting. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFrancisX

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a nice gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a friend - they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg7719

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This has held up surprisingly well. Reviews were mixed at the time of purchase, but I've had no issues. My girlfriend thought it leaked, like many others have said, but that's just because she was holding it the wrong way. I've had zero problems and it's held up well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY unless you are playing "Bartender"
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bartender and you are looking for a travel kit..... Do not purchase this. It is cheap the strainer is not the appropriate measurement for any glass and the plastic stand itself will tip over. I stored it away and will have a yard sale to get rid of it. WASTE OF MONEY unless you are playing "Bartender".
customer_reviews.author: S.LLC

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY PURPOSES
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, compact, and simple. Love the way it looks on my portable bar/cart.
customer_reviews.author: P McCord

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Shaker, but Good Set
customer_reviews.text: Great Set except for the shaker which seems to leak every time we try to shake a drink up. All the other utensils are usable though and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Journals

customer_reviews.title: Really great and sturdy starter set
customer_reviews.text: Really great and sturdy starter set. No problems with leaks as of yet, I feel like the problems people have had may have been user error. I sharpend the knife and it's actually pretty functional and decent.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised. I enjoy using it, it looks great, and it has plenty of pieces for every drink I could imagine. They only problem is it at times feels kind of cheap and they painted the measuring cup with lead paint. I'm not sure whose bright idea this is, and it's no biggee for what it is used for, but it still seems kind of... not smart. Good product over all though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Snyder

customer_reviews.title: After a small moderation, it's just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I had to put a small piece between the bottom pieces to make it look even, otherwise it droops down in the middle. I love the shaker and use it every time friends come over!
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Party accessories
customer_reviews.text: Santa hit a home run with this gift. Senior year at college just got so grown up.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN B LOGAN

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: As of right now I am giving this set 5 stars. It has held up so far. For the people who say that it leaks they should learn to use it better. I was trying to make it leak one day with my girlfriend and we could not get it to leak no matter what way we shook it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hess

customer_reviews.title: its ok. You'll need space.
customer_reviews.text: I guess there is nothing wrong with the actual product, because I knew what I was getting. But I just didnt really like it. Everything has this really long handles that are more in the way than anything else. The stand is not even that sturdy and is hard to find a place to put it all.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little better but it's a pretty good set.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool compact set for your kitchen or bar area. The shaker isn't that great and it doesn't come with a muddler.
customer_reviews.author: QD

customer_reviews.title: Decent piece...
customer_reviews.text: Like the set, but the stand is not the best plastic design. Although the items are well made and seem to work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and looked nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looked nice. It ended up being too much clutter for what we wanted and ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Americhanka

customer_reviews.title: I have not used many of the items, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used many of the items, I purchased it for an outdoor bar area on my deck, more to come when the weather breaks and we migrate out to the sunshine
customer_reviews.author: Corvin J. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing! I was a little worried it was going to look and act cheaply made, but it serves its purpose with style! It was a gift to my bar-loving boyfriend and everything was intact and shiny! It even arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: The holder is "cheaper" than I thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: The holder is "cheaper" than I thought it would be, but all of the pieces look to be well made. Having the cutting board is a neat addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stand is a bit flimsy, but all the tools work very well and seem more durable
customer_reviews.author: GCS

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a birthday gift for present and he enjoyed it too much. He even brags about his small bar kit when we have visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  M. Cordero-Soto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and delivered in a timely manner. was sold as an open box but was brand new
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Makes nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I have bought. Makes nice gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Bobear

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for a newbie! I am not a drinker but works for me when I decide to try something new.
customer_reviews.author: A. Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job, looks sleek. Works great, looks professional. I really like this set up, great price especially since getting all of this at a store is way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SPO

customer_reviews.title: be a boss
customer_reviews.text: This set looks pristine sitting at bar height below my raised liquor cabinet. The stainless shine commands respect from all who see it. I would reccomend also buying a nice muddler and an ice bucket.
customer_reviews.author: happygolucky

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The mixer glass doesn't work super well, or at least the seal is a little tricky. But it also has measurements on it and some standard recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A Jones

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knife can be thrown in the garbage and the bottle opener bends very easily, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Drink Station
customer_reviews.text: every piece is made well and love the stand for everything. Have had it for almost a year and use it very often. recipes on the glass are good. Love it, bought another for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Vol4Life

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. I was hoping the knife was a little sharper but it does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ibanez

customer_reviews.title: true to size and picture of product. Kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: true to size and picture of product. Kind of looks a little cheaper than what I wanted, but it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. Comes with all you need. So cute and made a great present
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It is much cheaper looking in person. Doesn't not seem up to the Oggi brand quality. Gave as a gift and regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: purchased new, came used.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this looked really nice, but when it came it was obviously used. The glass looked like it was washed about 20 times, and the paint was coming off. It was all packed into one big plastic sack that looked like a repack. I was going to exchange for new one, but after looking at the utensils I noticed how cheap they where. The frame was also not very solid. I returned it for my money, and I am buying one from another place.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Good basic bar-ware kit. Oversold the entire kit as the shaker and strainer are really the only tools necessary, as the shaker is nicely graduated,don't really need the jigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Clare

customer_reviews.title: Shaken, not stirred ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a Christmas gift for my youngest son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: This product was perfect for his start up home bar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend that likes to mix his own cocktails. This product was perfect for his start up home bar.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sturdy pieces, leaky shaker though
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and all the pieces are made pretty well and are sturdy, however the shaker can't hold too much liquid (2 martinis probably), so I am going to buy a separate shaker and use that one.
customer_reviews.author: Brad H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. Have been using it for the past 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are pleased with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Orbanus

customer_reviews.title: Happy Home Bartender!
customer_reviews.text: All the tools you need, in one handy place! It looks great on my bar good and the quality of the pieces for this kind of money can't be matched. I considered a few options and went with Oggi and I'm glad I did. No issues with the shaker like I've read in other reviews. Use it correctly and it will treat you well.
customer_reviews.author: KS Rocks!

customer_reviews.title: ... a wedding gift for a young couple and they LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a wedding gift for a young couple and they LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Oma919

customer_reviews.title: Great set, one small issue
customer_reviews.text: This product was received quickly and as advertised, its is a very nice, sturdy set. Great for the money. I'd give 5 stars except one piece (the bottle opener) was missing. It was just a bit of a hassle to return the set for just that one part.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O

customer_reviews.title: First Home Bar Set  = 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was looking for (except a muddler). Extremely pleased - now just need the alcohol and free-time to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Zur goldenen Ehrhoernchen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the set. use it often. great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: janet zheng

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for house holds and amateurs. Makes for a great gift. Not good enough for professional use
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son. He likes all the tools included in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift and has everything you need for bar wear!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and just as I expected
customer_reviews.text: My bf was very excited to finally have a lil bar start up set.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Y.

customer_reviews.title: AHmazing.  CHEERS!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing and adds a great touch to my mini-bar. I can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jdom

customer_reviews.title: oggi bar tool set
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet bit it seems of decent quality and it looks very nice. probably can't beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: IBAmazon'

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift to a friend. He loved it! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Army Retired!

customer_reviews.title: decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I expected something a little nicer but it is a decent deal for the money. Knife wont really cut anything and the shaker will leak sometimes but not very often. Kind of nice to have everything in a set and readily available.
customer_reviews.author: stanb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set as a gift and they loved it. The stand makes it look even more stylish. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaedon Grinnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good little toolkit if you are not looking for anything elaborate. Kinda wish it came with a travel case however.
customer_reviews.author: th

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits amazing on my bar, gives it a really nice look. The tools are not bar quality, but they're enough to be home bar quality :) at the price you're paying, it's a great deal :) Make sure to seal the shaker well before shaking :)
customer_reviews.author: Nizar Mahfouz

customer_reviews.title: Great look and lots of goodies
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't drink at home but I do have a bar and this set compliments the bar quite nicely. I haven't used it yet but it sure looks good :) I uploaded a picture of my bar with the item, check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: fabulous bar set
customer_reviews.text: The bar set is perfect! It has everything you need to make those drinks you desire, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Just like it! Looks very nice and worth it's price for sure. If looking for decent bar tools for your home bar that's probably it!
customer_reviews.author: Grigory

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift - they were building a new Bar in their home and loved it.. a great set with all the essentials
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to make great cocktails. All great quality items apart from the knife which I find a bit blunt but I've got plenty of knives that can do the job. Overall would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Rating
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my Cocktail Shaker Set. I have put it to work a few times and it does everything and more. I would recommends this to anyone getting a bar fort he home.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ray Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my boyfriend he absolutely loves it and it works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shaker lid doesn't really fit well but its a great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Dapper Looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our "grand opening" party to celebrate the basement remodel. It was shipped in time and looks great on my new bar. We use it a lot and love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sessor

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: It was bought as a gift for a friend and she said it was exactly what they needed for their bar area.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift? Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he was so excited. He loves it! Highly recommend it for a manly gift- for a man who likes to make drinks at least. Nice and affordable gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Hood

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap plastic. Not something you want sitting on your bar.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: one smile says it all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my hubby and when we got it.He totally loved it! He can't wait to start making his drinks. So 5 Stars for us because the smile on his face is all I need for me to say it was worth getting it for him and that makes me happy to. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take up much space and has everything I need!
customer_reviews.author: S. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my grandson asked for. He will be thrilled at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Nola VanDyk

customer_reviews.title: don't count on the recipes staying on glass
customer_reviews.text: the drink recipes all came off the glass after one washing. My parents have something similar that is 30 years old and still is readable.
customer_reviews.author: Chrsi  Hillebrecht

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The girlfriend has been looking at a bar set for over a year now, I got her this for Christmas and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made the perfect Anniversary gift for my boyfriend:) He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: the knife is useless!!
customer_reviews.text: I like them all, but the knife can cut anything at all including the lime and lemon, the Strainer isn't fit with shaker cup.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.DD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I received the package and it is so cute... we are giving it to our nephew who is in collage and I think he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A Benson

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: best coffee maker I've ever owned. lets you know when the coffee is done. great for making tea & chocolet
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great for decoration
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good and will decorate your home bar. I have not had the cause to explore its uses yet.
customer_reviews.author: PeterO

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is a perfect example of "you get what you pay for". Bought it for a gift and could not get in clear conscience give such a poor quality and cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: S.E.V

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easily damaged. The shaker and Jigger are the two good pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The knife can't cut to save its life. The cutting board looks like its been through the shredder after cutting on it 2-3 times, the bar spoon is good if all you want to do is stir, and the spring around the hawthorn strainer keeps coming undone. I uses the shaker and the jigger frequently and they're perfect. The rest of it isn't worth much.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis Entreri

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and don't buy this toolset
customer_reviews.text: I thought its a great toolset because of variety of tools this toolset has. But when i received it all excitement ended the moment i put it all together. Signs of erosion on different tools right out of the box without using it for something that is called "stainless steel". Plastic tray and stand is made from the cheapest plastic possible. The glass top sealer was also almost torn apart. I am returning it as I am finishing this review
customer_reviews.author: Sepehr Pakbaz

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother. He appreciated it, but I haven't heard anything good or bad about it. From what I saw, it felt cheaply made. So maybe just use this kit if you occasionally make cocktails. A more serious bartender should get more serious tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: First off I'll say this bar set looks great. But I was disappointed with the quality. The stand feels like it's made of pretty cheap plastic, the knife was having some trouble cutting through a lime, and the seal on the mixing cup moves around and it tends to leak when you use the shaker. My wife bought me this set for my birthday and we were both really excited about it. But now that it's here it's pretty disappointing. I think we might end up sending it back and putting in the extra money to get something a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Pantanga34

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mini Bar Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband and we both love it! There are certain items we use more than others, mainly because of the drinks we prepare, but everything is very nice quality. It doesn't take up much space on my counter, which was something I was concerned about. The only thing I wish it had was a muddler, but I bought this separately and stand it on the surface without any problems. I will say that I typically dry everything after washing them so nothing rusts. I had a problem with another item made of similar material getting a little rusty, so I am cautious now.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Moore

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: This item is maybe ok for home use but poor quality. I've been a bartender for many many years - Ive used a lot of bar tools in my carreer. These are only good for the home bar to mix a drink every once and awhile. My shaker leaked. My knife wouldn't cut a lime...those two things alone were enough for me to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA AIELLO

customer_reviews.title: Good for the casual cocktail drinker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a spur of the moment thing when I finished my liquor cart. Some of the pieces feel really cheap and I never use them, but I do like the shaker cup, stirrer, strainer. The jigger just feels really awkward, the tongs are cheap. Still not a bad investment if you need some basic bar tools and don't want to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: looks cool
customer_reviews.text: never used it because i just liked the way it looked. I'm not making drinks that's what a wife is for
customer_reviews.author: chicago1

customer_reviews.title: Shaker does not form good seal
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews said the cocktail mixer/shaker does not form a good seal. The knife is also not very sharp. I also think the ice tongs and bottle opener are a waste of space because they are not needed and everyone already has a bottle opener. I would much prefer a muddler in place. However the set looks good and appears to be durable. A great gift for an aspiring bar aficionado.
customer_reviews.author: cattledog_wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went with this option. Great price for amount of bar tools.
customer_reviews.text: The shaker has a solid rubber connection between the two halves. The cutting tray is a great plus that a lot of bar sets do not include. The base is made from a cheaper material, but unless you plan on moving it a lot, I would not even take that into consideration when deciding to purchase. Very good for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: stk34630

customer_reviews.title: An awesome set for an aspiring drink maker
customer_reviews.text: An awesome set for an aspiring drink maker, or a drink newbie. Has all the tools needed to get someone (who may have just turned 21 possibly?) started off in the cocktail game. The set's stand is useful and nice looking as well, and was what sold me on this set as opposed to the others on Amazon. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: It would be an extreme affair cutting anything other than butter with the given "citrus" knife and the whole set came packaged e
customer_reviews.text: The materials in this set are fairly cheap. It would be an extreme affair cutting anything other than butter with the given "citrus" knife and the whole set came packaged extremely dirty. Aside from that, not a bad starter set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be brand new, but it looked like it had been opened to me. The packaging seemed incomplete although all the items were there. UPDATE- 10/15/2014... We've used this many times since last Christmas and it's great. Good quality and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great bar set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool set for the money. I like that it came with multiple items needed to make drinks. Most importantly a stirrer, a jigger, the tumblers, and as an added bonus the stand, the cutting board, the knife and even a bottle opener. Great item for anyone who hosts guests who like to drink and a great addition for your home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Reyes

product_meta.title: Oggi Pro Stainless-Steel 10-Piece Cocktail Shaker and Bar Tool Set
product_meta.description: With innovative designs and contemporary finishes, Oggi’s kitchen, bar and bath wares are truly tomorrow’s house wares today. Oggi’s 10-Piece Stainless Steel Bar Set with Rectangular Stand is no exception. Black stand and cutting board. Stainless steel tools with black accents. Set includes a two-piece glass and stainless shaker set, double jigger, lemon / lime slicing knife, bottle cap lifter, cocktail strainer, stirrer, tongs, chopping board and a rectangular stand. Set is great for home bars and parties.
feature_bullets: 10-piece stainless-steel bar set, great for home bars and parties
Includes a double jigger and a 2-piece glass and stainless shaker set for mixing drinks
Also comes with lemon/lime slicing knife, bottle opener, cocktail strainer, stirrer, and tongs
All tools made of durable stainless steel with contemporary black accents
Includes cutting board and black stand for storage
